about.paragraph1: Originally a developer, I learned to understand algorithms. Today, I turn them into emotional and growth levers.
about.paragraph2: My approach to community management is analytical, human, and impact-driven. I don't just manage accounts, I build communities that turn brands into movements.
about.quote: Here, creativity meets strategy. Every post is thought out, every community is cultivated, every brand becomes a movement.

services.description: Complete solutions to turn your digital presence into a growth machine

service1.title: Digital Strategy
service1.subtitle: Brand Audit & Positioning
service1.description: Comprehensive analysis of networks, competitors, and brand tone to build a winning strategy.

service2.title: Content Creation
service2.subtitle: Management & Visual Storytelling
service2.description: Creation of visuals, videos, and texts that build a strong and memorable identity.

service3.title: Growth & Engagement
service3.subtitle: Influence Campaigns
service3.description: Develop a loyal, active, and qualified audience that transforms your brand into a community.

service4.title: Social Advertising
service4.subtitle: Meta Ads, TikTok, LinkedIn
service4.description: Optimize advertising campaigns to maximize reach and conversions with optimal ROI.

service5.title: Automation & Performance
service5.subtitle: Competitive Monitoring
service5.description: Set up reporting tools, alerts, and automatic publishing to gain efficiency.

service6.title: Web & App Development
service6.subtitle: Modern, fast and optimized websites
service6.description: I create professional websites and lightweight applications to strengthen your digital presence.

service7.title: Digital Training & Certifications
service7.subtitle: Master Community Management and explore other key digital skills
service7.description: Benefit from hands-on training and strategic guidance to develop your expertise in Community Management and prepare for recognized digital certifications, while strengthening your credibility and professional opportunities.

features.feature3: Personalized support to boost your career

cases.description: Brands transformed, communities built, measurable results

case1.title: Tech Brand Launch on Instagram
case1.challenge: Build a digital presence from scratch
case1.strategy: Educational content strategy + targeted collaborations + authentic storytelling
case1.quote: Free Digital transformed our vision into an engaged community. His strategic approach exceeded all expectations.

case2.title: LinkedIn B2B Engagement Campaign
case2.challenge: Improve visibility and generate qualified leads
case2.strategy: Thought leadership + premium content + active engagement with decision makers
case2.quote: Rare B2B expertise. The results speak for themselves.

case3.title: Strategic Communication Redesign
case3.challenge: Revitalize a dormant brand on social media
case3.strategy: Complete repositioning + UGC strategy + multi-platform creative campaigns
case3.quote: Free Digital brought our brand back to life. The impact on sales was immediate.

contact.description: Let's build a strategy together that makes your audience's heart beat
